title: Above the Sky - Novel Updates
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cultivation   Dao Comprehension   Distrustful Protagonist   Enemies Become Allies   Evil Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Inheritance   Ruthless Protagonist   Selfish Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Lian Hua Lang Mian   莲花郎面
description:
Go through all the heavenly tribulation to be the immortal power.

Who is above the Sky?

She is the only one.

————————————

If I have to choose one from being the strongest and being the love of the strongest, I will choose the former one without hesitation.>
